node.description: ### 💡 Add your OpenAI API key here
### 💡 Add your AgentQL API key here

# Price Deal Finder 

This flow searches and compares prices of a product on the web.
## Prerequisites

* **[AgentQL API Key](https://dev.agentql.com/api-keys)**
* **[OpenAI API Key](https://platform.openai.com/)**
* **[TavilyAI Search API Key](https://tavily.com/)**

## Quick Start

1. Add your [AgentQL API Key](https://dev.agentql.com/api-keys) to the **AgentQL** component.
2. Add your [OpenAI API Key](https://platform.openai.com/) to the **Agent** component.
3. Add your [TavilyAI Search API Key](https://tavily.com/) to the **Tavily AI Search** component.
4. Click **Playground** and enter a product in chat. For example, search "iPhone 16 Pro 512 GB")
* The **Agent** component populates the **Tavily AI Search** component's **Search Query** field, and the **Agent QL** component's **URL** and **Query** fields. 

* The **Agent** returns a structured response to your searcn in the chat.
### 💡 Add your Tavily AI Search key here
Define the agent's instructions, then enter a task to complete using tools.

add_current_date_tool.info: If true, will add a tool to the agent that returns the current date.
add_current_date_tool.name: add_current_date_tool

agent_description.info: The description of the agent. This is only used when in Tool Mode. Defaults to 'A helpful assistant with access to the following tools:' and tools are added dynamically. This feature is deprecated and will be removed in future versions.
agent_description.name: agent_description
agent_description.value: A helpful assistant with access to the following tools:

context_id.info: The context ID of the chat. Adds an extra layer to the local memory.
context_id.name: context_id

format_instructions.info: Generic Template for structured output formatting. Valid only with Structured response.
format_instructions.name: format_instructions
format_instructions.value: You are an AI that extracts structured JSON objects from unstructured text. Use a predefined schema with expected types (str, int, float, bool, dict). Extract ALL relevant instances that match the schema - if multiple patterns exist, capture them all. Fill missing or ambiguous values with defaults: null for missing values. Remove exact duplicates but keep variations that have different field values. Always return valid JSON in the expected format, never throw errors. If multiple objects can be extracted, return them all in the structured format.

handle_parsing_errors.info: Should the Agent fix errors when reading user input for better processing?
handle_parsing_errors.name: handle_parsing_errors

input_value.info: The input provided by the user for the agent to process.
input_value.name: input_value

max_iterations.info: The maximum number of attempts the agent can make to complete its task before it stops.
max_iterations.name: max_iterations

n_messages.info: Number of chat history messages to retrieve.
n_messages.name: n_messages

output_schema.info: Schema Validation: Define the structure and data types for structured output. No validation if no output schema.
output_schema.name: output_schema

table_schema.description: Specify the name of the output field.
table_schema.name: name

table_schema.description: Describe the purpose of the output field.
table_schema.name: description

table_schema.description: Indicate the data type of the output field (e.g., str, int, float, bool, dict).
table_schema.name: type

table_schema.description: Set to True if this output field should be a list of the specified type.
table_schema.name: multiple

system_prompt.info: System Prompt: Initial instructions and context provided to guide the agent's behavior.
system_prompt.name: system_prompt
system_prompt.value: You are a helpful assistant that can use tools to answer questions and perform tasks.

tools.info: These are the tools that the agent can use to help with tasks.
tools.name: tools

description: Searches and compares product prices across multiple e-commerce platforms.
name: Price Deal Finder
